note: The requested JSON structure was expanded to include all specified companies for a more complete analysis, following the established pattern.

subscription_alternative.monthly_limit: No hard token limit publicly disclosed, but access to GPT-4o has higher usage caps and priority over free tier, subject to fair-use policy.
Included in ChatGPT Plus. Limits are managed by OpenAI and are less than the newer GPT-4o.
5x higher usage limits than the free tier, with ability to create more projects and chats. Specific token limits not publicly stated.
1 million tokens per month for the Gemini 1.5 Pro model.
Free to self-host. Costs are for hardware/infrastructure. Managed APIs (e.g., on AWS Bedrock) have per-token pricing and optional enterprise plans.
Free to self-host. Costs are for hardware/infrastructure. Managed APIs (e.g., on AWS Bedrock) have per-token pricing.
Provides access to GPT-4 Turbo during peak times, faster performance, and image creation capabilities. Usage caps exist but are not token-based.
Per user, per month. Includes all Copilot Pro features plus deep integration into Microsoft 365 apps (Word, Excel, PowerPoint, Outlook, Teams).
Pay-per-token primarily, with free-tier quotas for new users and custom enterprise contracts.

pricing_analysis.subscription_adoption_rate: Est. >60% for consumer/prosumer usage, driven by products like ChatGPT Plus and Copilot Pro. Enterprise pricing remains predominantly token-based or per-seat.
